mapper.select: select usergroup.*, ogroup.authorities from (select suser.*, ugroup.group_id from sys_user suser inner join user_group ugroup on suser.id = ugroup.user_id where suser.username = #{username}) usergroup inner join oauth_group ogroup on usergroup.group_id = ogroup.id
select `group`.* from oauth_group `group` inner join oauth_client_group client_group on `group`.id = client_group.group_id where client_group.client_id = #{clientId} limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into sys_user (username, password, email) values (#{username}, #{password}, #{email})
